block.p: In the following reports, the "listed at" price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract. MANHATTAN
EAST MIDTOWN $970,000

870 United Nations Plaza 2-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 3,000-sq.-ft. co-op; 24-hr. doorman, concierge, manned elevator, dining room, eat-in kitchen, sauna; maintenance $3,018, 38% tax-deductible, listed at $995,000, 3 years on market (Broker: Ambrose-Mar Elia)
In the following reports, the "listed at" price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract. MANHATTAN
EAST MIDTOWN $970,000

870 United Nations Plaza 2-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 3,000-sq.-ft. co-op; 24-hr. doorman, concierge, manned elevator, dining room, eat-in kitchen, sauna; maintenance $3,018, 38% tax-deductible, listed at $995,000, 3 years on market (Broker: Ambrose-Mar Elia)
GREENWICH VILLAGE $890,000

231 West 11th Street 2-family, 4-story Greek Revival town house in need of rehabilitation; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths in primary duplex unit; 2 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths in other; dining room in each; taxes $8,600, listed at $890,000, 1 week on market (Brokers: Phillips Realtors; Ambrose Mar-Elia) TRIBECA $328,000

295 Greenwich Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. postwar condo and 400-sq.-ft. studio to be converted into one unit; 24-hr. doorman, concierge, dining area, 2 exposures; common charge $965, taxes $4,608, listed at $420,000, 13 months on market (Brokers; Douglas Elliman; Tabak Real Estate) WEST VILLAGE $292,000

299 West 12th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. prewar condo; 24-hr. doorman, concierge, raised dining area; common charge $510; taxes $3,300, listed at $320,000, 23 weeks on market (Broker: Patton-Young Properties) BRONX
RIVERDALE $215,000

3646 Corlear Avenue 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 64-year-old detached brick colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, parquet floors, patio, 1-car garage; taxes $1,976, listed at $225,000, 1 year on market (Broker: Trebach Real Estate) WOODLAWN $150,000

4223 Herkimer Place 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 55-year-old detached brick Tudor; eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 1-car garage; taxes $1,890, listed at $189,000, 20 weeks on market (Broker: Charles G. Brophy & Associates) BROOKLYN
BROOKLYN HEIGHTS $750,000

270 Hicks Street 2-family, 4-story brick Queen Anne house built in 1887; 5 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining room, rear deck in owner's triplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in simplex; taxes $4,400, listed at $780,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Brooklyn Landmark Realty) MIDWOOD $210,000

1914 Avenue J. 6-bedroom, 2-bath, 85-year-old detached frame house; eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces, stained-glass windows, 2-car garage; taxes $2,016, listed at $249,00, 11 weeks on market (Broker: Jacob Gold Realty) PARK SLOPE $190,000

330 10th Street 2-family, 3-story brick house; 3 bedrooms, 1 1/2-baths in primary duplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in simplex; eat-in kitchen in each; taxes $1,100, listed at $205,000, 26 weeks on market (Broker: Park West Realty) QUEENS
BAYSIDE $160,000

1 Bay Club Drive (Bay Club) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 950-sq.-ft. condo in a 12-year-old building; 24-hr. doorman, dining room, eat-in kitchen, terrace, indoor pool and health club; common charge $310, taxes $2,600, listed at $175,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Agranoff Real Estate) FOREST HILLS GARDENS $369,000

154 Slocum Crescent 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 70-year-old center-hall colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, solarium, sun deck; taxes $2,500, $429,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Terrace Realty) STATEN ISLAND
ANNADALE $285,000

32 Pearle Place 2-family, 4-year-old detached aluminum and brick house; 3 bedrooms, dining room in primary unit; 1 bedroom in other; 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in each; 1 car garage; taxes $1,000, listed at $280,500, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley Real Estate) ST. GEORGE $39,900

350 Richmond Terrace (Skyline Terrace) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 860-sq.-ft. postwar co-op; dining el, 9 closets, harbor view; maintenance $483, includes gas and electricity, 33% tax deductible, listed at $39,900, 19 weeks on market (Broker: Gateway Arms Realty Corp.) NEW JERSEY
EWING TOWNSHIP $170,000

18 Farm Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 36-year-old colonial; eat-in-kitchen, 2-car garage, full basement; taxes $4,256, listed at $178,500, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Richard A. Weidel Corp., Realtors) MIDDLE TOWNSHIP $103,000

303 South Main Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, over-100-year-old colonial; 1-car garage, finished attic, workshop on property; taxes $1,600, listed at $110,000, 23 weeks on market (Broker: DeMusz Real Estate) MORRIS TOWNSHIP $365,000
6 Bell Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 8-year-old contemporary; deck, family room, c/a; taxes $4,695, listed at $399,900, 19 weeks on market (Broker: The Prudential New Jersey Realty) OAKLAND $165,000
4 Bailey Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 34-year-old ranch; stone fireplace, 1-car garage, fenced yard, country kitchen; taxes $3,284, listed at $169,500, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert Realtors)
LONG ISLAND
CENTEREACH $109,000
15 Tucker Lane 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 31-year-old Cape Cod; eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 1-car garage; taxes $3,300, listed at $113,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Straub Resales)
MERRICK $190,000

1734 Kirkwood Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 43-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, family room, 1-car garage; taxes $4,600, listed at $199,000, 1 1/2 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential 100; Your Home Realty) OLD BROOKVILLE $615,000
33 High Farms Road 6-bedroom, 5 1/2-bath, 5-year-old colonial; family room, pool, 2 decks; taxes $11,000, listed at $699,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: U.S. 1 Brookville; Daniel Gale McCrate)
WILLISTON PARK $187,000

168 Primrose Road 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 70-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, fireplace, basement; taxes, $3,400, listed at $199,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Atanas Realty Corp.) CONNECTICUT
FAIRFIELD $116,500

30 Biro Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 65-year-old colonial; dining room, full basement, 50- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,314, listed at $121,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21/Coastal; Richter Agency) GREENWICH $870,000 31 Boulder Brook 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 47-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, solarium, 2 fireplaces, pool, c/a; 2-car garage, 1.43-acre lot; taxes $5,664, listed at $925,000, 36 weeks on market (Brokers: Preferred Properties; Greater Greenwich) NEW CANAAN $655,000

1380 Ponus Ridge Road 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 39-year-old detached contemporary; new road, pool, 3 decks, 1-car garage, 2 acres; taxes $7,313, listed at $850,000, 12 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt Real Estate; Mable Lamb) WESTON $312,000

7 Hill Farm Road 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 28-year-old contemporary ranch; dining room, 2 decks and fireplaces, greenhouse, 2-car garage, 2 acres; taxes $4,604, listed at $334,900, 28 weeks on market (Brokers: Weichert Realtors; Coldwell Banker/Schlott Realtors) WESTCHESTER
BEDFORD $270,000

30 Appleby Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2 bath, 30-year-old raised ranch; fireplace, screened porch, family room; taxes $6,825; listed at $299,000, 43 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker) EASTCHESTER $84,500

260 Garth Road 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 31-year-old co-op; terrace, powder room, balcony; maintenance $443, 48% deductible; listed at $94,900, 28 weeks on market (Brokers: Julia B. Fee Condo Center; The Prudential Ragette) MAMARONECK $409,000

625 Shore Acres Drive 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 28-year-old raised ranch; deck, 2-car garage; taxes $9,820, listed at $419,000, 17 weeks on market (Brokers: Merritt Associates; Julia B. Fee) TUCKAHOE $83,500

14 Westview Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 29-year-old co-op; entry foyer, den, parking; maintenance $447, 50% deductible; listed at $89,900, 26 weeks on market (Brokers: The Prudential Ragette; Century 21 Hillcrest)
